attributes.action: Repay all capital gains made by MPs on their second homes together with all claims made and found to be unrelated to their parliamentary function
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The privileges enjoyed by M.P.s having been recently spotlighted as being abused on a grand scale is unacceptable and brings Parliament into disrepute.
By way of fundamental reform a new way of electing the leaders of Britain needs to be found that will restore public faith in our servants at Westminster.
I suggest a type of Jury Service that would suggest membership from the respected professions and be scrupulously vetted by their respective peer groups before a prospective M.P. could stand for election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
